content: striped modular scarf that uses up 3 single skeins from your stash i knitted the sample with alpaca boucle and merino dk but tweedy sock yarn or even skinny singles would be a great choice have fun with colours the fuzzy texture adds a lovely element to the simplicity of this design shop hedgehog fibres texture sets here 1 yarn 2 skeins of hedgehog fibres merino dk 100% merino wool 100g/200m in two different colourways 1 skein of hedgehog fibres alpaca boucle 66% alpaca/34% silk 100g/620m the colours pictured are a sugar and c labyrinth for the merino dk and alpaca boucle in b moon stone 1 https //shop hedgehogfibres com/collections/yarn-set
